title: Saint Anthony
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the lithograph from the artist for $20 (see invoice from Mr. Spruance, dated December 1, 1951, with acknowledgement of payment on December 14, 1951.) In a letter to Carnegie Institute offering a number of potential gifts, dated October 25, 1951, Mrs. Beal wrote that "One print "Saint Anthony" will come by Mail."  The lithograph was accessioned on November 1, 1951.
